'''Curious Challenges''' are [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in the [[Veluriyam Mirage]] during the [[Secret Summer Paradise]] event that reward a [[Fascinating Chest]].

After using the [[Flowing Joyspar]] or [[Felicitous Joyspar]] Gadgets, they are marked as {{Icon|Curious Challenge}}.
